[File: serai/networks/bitcoin/src/rpc.rs] [Overall] [Soft Fork - Medium] Can soft fork activation (e.g., Taproot) cause older Bitcoin nodes to accept transactions that newer rules would reject?

[File: serai/networks/bitcoin/src/rpc.rs] [Overall] [Request Queuing - Low] Is there request queuing to handle burst traffic without overwhelming the Bitcoin node?
